item.title: G20 foreign ministers at odds over Ukraine
item.description: The Ukraine war dominated the G20 meeting in India. The United States and its allies called for continued pressure on Russia to end the conflict. But due to Russian and Chinese opposition, a joint statement was off the table. @DW
item.keywords: DWVC,India, G20, USA, Russia, Ukraine, China, foreign politics, foreign affairs, Blinken, Lavrov, Modi

media:content.media:title: G20 foreign ministers at odds over Ukraine
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,India, G20, USA, Russia, Ukraine, China, foreign politics, foreign affairs, Blinken, Lavrov, Modi

item.title: One month after the deadly Syria-Turkey earthquake
item.description: At 4:17 a.m. on 6 February 2023, a 7.7 magnitude earthquake struck southern Turkey. Thousands of buildings collapsed in Turkey and Syria. Now, a month later, both countries are still mourning their losses.
item.keywords: DWVC,quake, earthquake, Turkey, Syria, natural disaster, catastrophe

media:content.media:title: One month after the deadly Syria-Turkey earthquake
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,quake, earthquake, Turkey, Syria, natural disaster, catastrophe

item.title: Palestinian school introduces VR classroom for its students
item.description: Students of the The Al-Basma Modern School in Gaza can explore interactively the world of science, mathematics, and engineering using headsets and VR handles. Do you think Virtual Reality in schools would improve education?
item.keywords: DWVC,DWDigital, VR, virtual reality, education, Palestine, Gaza

media:content.media:title: Palestinian school introduces VR classroom for its students
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,DWDigital, VR, virtual reality, education, Palestine, Gaza

item.title: E-bandage speeds healing
item.description: A new electronic bandage helps wounds heal 30% faster and then dissolves in the body.

item.title: Startups in India upcycling used shoes
item.description: 2 billion pairs of shoes are produced in India every year, most of which end their life up in the dump. How to reduce this waste?

item.title: Thousands of migrants have died in Southern Texas
item.description: More than 7,500 migrants have died in the desert of Southern Texas since 1999. But a local NGO is trying to save their lives.
item.keywords: DWVC,United States, Texas, USA, US border, Mexico, Brooks County, migration
